emergency.title: Emergency Help
emergency.warning: Emergency help will notify nearby users, please ensure the situation is urgent and real
emergency.descriptionPlaceholder: Please describe your situation in detail so others can help you better...
emergency.rescuerPlaceholder: Enter the number of rescuers needed
emergency.tip1: ‚Ä¢ Emergency help will be pushed to users within 5km
emergency.tip2: ‚Ä¢ Please ensure the description is true and accurate, false help will be penalized

verificationModal.uploadTip: Please ensure ID information is clear and complete
verificationModal.qualificationsDesc: Please upload your professional qualification certificates (e.g., lawyer license, medical license, teacher certificate, etc.)
verificationModal.qualificationTip: Supports uploading lawyer license, medical license, teacher certificate and other professional qualifications
verificationModal.contactMethodDesc: Please fill in at least one contact method
verificationModal.licenseTip: Please upload clear registration document photos (such as business license, organization code certificate, etc.), ensure information is complete and visible
verificationModal.authorizerIdTip: Please upload authorizer's ID card front and back, ensure information is clear
verificationModal.certificateTip: Please upload official documents with official seal, such as: organization code certificate, public institution legal person certificate, etc.
verificationModal.submitSuccessMessage: Your verification application has been submitted. We will complete the review within 1-3 business days. Please wait patiently.
verificationModal.deleteQualificationConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this qualification certificate?

teamDetail.title: Team Details
teamDetail.restrictedNotice: You haven't joined this team yet, you can only view team member information

join.pendingNotice: Application under review, requires approval from over 50% of members
join.applyMessage:
Are you sure you want to apply to join this team?

After applying, you need to wait for team members to vote. You can join after more than 50% of members approve.
join.pendingModalDesc:
Your application has been submitted successfully!

Team members will vote on your application. You can join after more than 50% of members approve.

Please wait patiently for the result. We will notify you in time.

exit.title: Exit Team
exit.message: Are you sure you want to exit this team? You won't be able to view team messages after exiting

dismiss.title: Dismiss Team
dismiss.subtitle: This action cannot be undone, please proceed with caution
dismiss.warningTitle: ‚ö†Ô∏è The following will happen after dismissal:
dismiss.warning1: ‚Ä¢ All team data will be permanently deleted
dismiss.warning2: ‚Ä¢ All members will be removed from the team
dismiss.warning3: ‚Ä¢ Team discussion records cannot be recovered
dismiss.warning4: ‚Ä¢ All team announcements will be deleted

incomeRankingScreen.title: Income Ranking
incomeRankingScreen.infoContent:
Income Ranking Info:

1. Total Income: Total rewards earned from answering questions
2. Monthly Income: Total rewards earned this month
3. Weekly Income: Total rewards earned this week

Rankings are updated every hour

tips.text: Added rewards will be combined with the original reward to attract more quality answers

validation.invalidAmount: Please enter a valid reward amount
